casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 16, 2013

[Cite as 04/16/2013 Case Announcements, 2013-0hio-1506.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Howard.

On September 24, 2004, this court found Gregory T. Howard to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03. This court further ordered that Howard was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in the court without obtaining leave. Howard has presented a motion for leave to reopen 28 cases.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave to reopen eases is denied.
